name: Add to Cart
description: Navigate to a product page, add item to cart, and verify success.

requiredParameters.name: url
requiredParameters.description: The URL of the specific product page

requiredParameters.name: addToCartButtonSelector
requiredParameters.description: Selector for the 'Add to Cart' button

requiredParameters.name: successSelector
requiredParameters.description: Selector for the success message or cart badge

requiredParameters.name: expectedText
requiredParameters.description: Text to expect (e.g. 'Added to cart' or '1')
